line: THE BUDGET MESSAGE
label: paragraph

line: To The Congress of The UniTed sTaTes:
label: paragraph

line: OF THE PRESIDENT
label: paragraph

line: In one year of working together, we have laid the foundation for a new era of American Greatness.
label: paragraph

line: We have boosted economic growth, created more than two million jobs, and added nearly $5 trillion
label: paragraph

line: in new wealth to the stock market. Unemployment is at a 17-year low, wages are rising, and jobs
label: paragraph

line: are returning to America. Starting this month, hardworking Americans are going to see increased
label: paragraph

line: take home pay because of the massive tax cuts and tax reform legislation we enacted at the end of
label: paragraph

line: last year.
label: paragraph

line: America is back to winning again. A great spirit of optimism continues to sweep across our
label: paragraph

line: Nation. Americans can once again be truly confident that our brightest days are ahead of us.
label: paragraph

line: This year’s Budget builds upon our incredible successes over the past year and rests on the fol-
label: paragraph

line: lowing pillars of reform:
label: paragraph

line: Ending Wasteful Spending. The United States is laboring under the highest level of debt held
label: paragraph

line: by the public since shortly after the Second World War. The current fiscal path is unsustainable,
label: paragraph

line: and future generations deserve better. The Budget makes the hard choices needed to stop wasteful
label: paragraph

line: spending, lower the national debt, and focus Government on what matters most—protecting the
label: paragraph

line: Nation.
label: paragraph

line: Expanding Economic Growth and Opportunity. The Budget continues our efforts to grow
label: paragraph

line: the economy, create millions of new jobs, and raise wages. To accompany our efforts to cut spending
label: paragraph

line: and implement massive tax cuts and reforms for American families, workers, and businesses, we
label: paragraph

line: will continue to relentlessly target unnecessary regulations for elimination. We will also continue
label: paragraph

line: driving America toward energy dominance and making the United States a net energy exporter by
label: paragraph

line: The Budget also redefines what is possible, by putting the American economy on a path to sus-
label: paragraph

line: tainable 3-percent long-term economic growth. Over the next decade, a steady rate of 3-percent eco-
label: paragraph

line: nomic growth will infuse trillions of additional dollars into our economy, fueling the dreams of the
label: paragraph

line: American people and sustaining a new era of American Greatness.
label: paragraph

line: Preserving Peace Through Strength. The Budget recognizes that we confront political, eco-
label: paragraph

line: nomic, and military adversaries and competitors that have required us to adjust our national se-
label: paragraph

line: curity strategy. Foremost, the Budget rebuilds and modernizes the military—to fulfill a core con-
label: paragraph

line: stitutional responsibility of the Federal Government. The Budget provides resources to enhance
label: paragraph

line: missile defense and to build the planes, tanks, warships, and cyber tools that the brave men and
label: paragraph

line: women who defend us need to deter aggression and, when necessary, to fight and win. Most impor-
label: paragraph

line: tantly, the Budget provides funds to increase the size of our Armed Forces and to give our men and
label: paragraph

line: women in uniform a well-earned pay raise. The Budget recognizes that we must deftly employ all
label: paragraph

line: of our tools of statecraft—diplomatic, intelligence-related, military, and economic—to compete and
label: paragraph

line: THE BUDGET MESSAGE OF THE PRESIDENT
label: heading

line: advance American influence. A world that supports American interests and reflects our values makes
label: paragraph

line: America more secure and prosperous.
label: paragraph

line: Building the Wall, Dismantling Transnational Criminal Organizations, and Enforcing
label: paragraph

line: Our Immigration Laws. The Budget reflects my Administration’s serious and ongoing commit-
label: paragraph

line: ment to fully secure our border, take the fight to criminal gangs like MS-13, and make our immigra-
label: paragraph

line: tion system work for Americans. The Budget provides funding for a wall on our Southwest border
label: paragraph

line: and additional resources for law enforcement at the Departments of Homeland Security and Justice.
label: paragraph

line: The Budget also funds an increase in the number of Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers,
label: paragraph

line: Border Patrol agents, and immigration judges to improve enforcement at the border and within the
label: paragraph

line: United States.
label: paragraph

line: Rebuilding our Infrastructure. World-class infrastructure is possible for the American people.
label: paragraph

line: Together we will build stunning new bridges, railways, waterways, tunnels, water treatment facili-
label: paragraph

line: ties, and highways. The Budget reflects a new vision for American infrastructure that would generate
label: paragraph

line: $1 trillion in infrastructure investment and speed its delivery to the American people.
label: paragraph

line: Supporting American Working Families. Due to changes in family structures, labor force com-
label: paragraph

line: position, and participation rates, the demands on American families have never been more complex
label: paragraph

line: or expensive to address. In addition to the middle income tax relief achieved with the passage of tax
label: paragraph

line: reform, the Budget reflects the importance of investing in American working families by making paid
label: paragraph

line: family leave available to new parents, investing in effective approaches to skills training like formal
label: paragraph

line: apprenticeships, and maintaining Federal funding and leveraging additional State dollars for pro-
label: paragraph

line: grams that help America’s working families access and afford child care. With these strategic invest-
label: paragraph

line: ments, the Budget empowers Americans to thrive in our modern economy.
label: paragraph

line: Protecting Our Veterans. The Budget fulfills our promise and obligation to care for our veterans
label: paragraph

line: and their families—men and women who answered our Nation’s call for help and sacrificed so much
label: paragraph

line: to defend us. Our veterans have earned nothing less than the absolute best care and benefits after
label: paragraph

line: their service has ended, and the Budget provides the funding necessary to treat them with the honor
label: paragraph

line: and respect they deserve. It is our Nation’s duty to ensure veterans have access to the medical treat-
label: paragraph

line: ment they need, when they need it—and that they have a choice when it comes to their care. The
label: paragraph

line: Budget also ensures that veterans receive training and support to re-enter the workforce and find
label: paragraph

line: well-paying jobs.
label: paragraph

line: Combatting Opioid Addiction. More Americans died from drug overdoses in 2016 than those
label: paragraph

line: who lost their lives in the Vietnam War. Opioids caused the overwhelming majority of these deaths,
label: paragraph

line: which is why my Administration has declared a nationwide Public Health Emergency with respect to
label: paragraph

line: opioids. The Budget reflects a solemn and unshakable commitment to liberate communities from the
label: paragraph

line: scourge of opioids and drug addiction.
label: paragraph

line: Fighting High Medical Drug Prices. Many patients face illness that could be cured or man-
label: paragraph

line: aged with the right medical drugs. But the prices for the drugs they need are often exorbitant.
label: paragraph

line: Unnecessarily high drug prices force many patients to choose between going without the medicines
label: paragraph

line: they need or making tremendous financial sacrifices. In addition, taxpayers all too often are left
label: paragraph

line: to pay inflated prices for drugs for patients who obtain them through Government programs. The
label: paragraph

line: Budget proposes new strategies to address high drug prices and increase access to drugs by address-
label: paragraph

line: ing perverse payment incentives and exposing drug companies to more aggressive competition, all
label: paragraph

line: while continuing to promote innovation and extend American dominance in the pharmaceutical field.
label: paragraph

line: Moving from Welfare to Work. Millions of our fellow Americans have been robbed of the dig-
label: paragraph

line: nity and independence that comes through the opportunity to work. Despite significant economic
label: paragraph

line: THE BUDGET FOR FISCAL YEAR 2019
label: paragraph

line: improvements and a strong recovery in the job market, enrollment in welfare programs remains
label: paragraph

line: stubbornly high in many places around the Nation. Millions of Americans are in a tragic state of de-
label: paragraph

line: pendency on a welfare system that does not reward work, and in many cases, pays people not to work.
label: paragraph

line: These programs, expanded during the previous administration, must now be reformed. While mov-
label: paragraph

line: ing able-bodied Americans back into the workforce, welfare reform must also protect public resources
label: paragraph

line: for the truly needy, especially the low-income elderly, children, and Americans with disabilities. The
label: paragraph

line: Budget includes sensible reforms to problems in our current welfare system, and aims to end debili-
label: paragraph

line: tating dependency while ensuring that our safety net is reserved for those Americans who truly need
label: paragraph

line: help.
label: paragraph

line: More Pathways to Affordable Education and Well-Paying Jobs. The Budget takes impor-
label: paragraph

line: tant steps to expand opportunities for Americans to access affordable, employment-relevant educa-
label: paragraph

line: tion that puts them on the path to a well-paying job and, ultimately, a fulfilling career. The Budget
label: paragraph

line: promotes formal apprenticeships, an evidence-based system that allows individuals to “earn-while
label: paragraph

line: they learn.” The Budget also makes important investments in science, technology, engineering, and
label: paragraph

line: mathematics (STEM) education in K-12 schools, and supports career and technical education in high
label: paragraph

line: schools and postsecondary institutions.
label: paragraph

line: Promoting School Choice. So many of America’s poorest children—especially African-American
label: paragraph

line: and Hispanic children—attend failing public schools that afford them little hope of fulfilling their
label: paragraph

line: great potential. That is why families should be free to choose the public, private, charter, magnet,
label: paragraph

line: religious, or home school option that is right for them. The Budget empowers parents, especially of
label: paragraph

line: our disadvantaged youth, to choose the very best school for their children.
label: paragraph

line: The Budget reflects our commitment to the safety, prosperity, and security of the American people.
label: paragraph

line: The more room our economy has to grow, and the more American companies are freed from constrict-
label: paragraph

line: ing over-regulation, the stronger and safer we become as a Nation.
label: paragraph

line: It is now up to the Congress to act. I pledge my full cooperation in unleashing the incredible and
label: paragraph

line: unparalleled potential of the American people. There is no limit to the promise of America when we
label: paragraph

line: keep our commitments to our fellow Americans and continue to put their interests first. Working
label: paragraph

line: together, we will do just that.
label: paragraph

line: The WhiTe hoUse,
label: paragraph

line: febrUary 2018
label: paragraph

line: DONALD J. TRUMP
label: paragraph
